title: Evaluating arsenic contamination in northwestern Bangladesh: A GIS-Based assessment of groundwater vulnerability and human health impacts
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Md Ahsan Habib, A.H.M. Selim Reza, Md Irfanul Hasan, Md Aminul Ahsan, Md Moniruzzaman, Asma Binta Hasan, Shofiul Islam Shofi, Kayesh Mahmud Hridoy
